description: Created a dynamic and intuitive dashboard that transforms complex data into actionable insights, empowering informed decision-making..
Created a dynamic Resume Generator project that empowers users to effortlessly generate professional resumes by inputting their information, streamlining the job application process.
Revolutionized user feedback with a dynamic hostel complaint app, streamlining communication and enhancing the living experience.
An innovative fitness companion that streamlines workout scheduling, tracking, and progress analysis, making every fitness journey a well-guided adventure.
I reimagined and revitalized the Jarvis AI concept, infusing it with modern technologies and intuitive user interactions, resulting in an AI assistant that seamlessly integrates into daily tasks
A web application where users can check if someone whom they are following on GitHub is following them back or not. It uses GitHub API to fetch data.
A design clone of the Adidas website. Static website built with React and CSS.
A mobile application to book movie tickets. It has stripe payment gateway for online transactions. It also has a QR code scanner to scan the ticket.
Envira Direct is a leading supplier of water treatment systems and components for the residential, commercial, and industrial markets. It uses stripe split payment method for online transactions.
A web application to calculate BMI. It uses the BMI formula to calculate the BMI.
A web application to get information about Pokémons. It uses PokéAPI to fetch data.
CRP Academy is a mobile application for a popular edtech company. It has live class, live chat with instructors, Inbuilt video player and PDF reader and many more features.

FixOn is a mobile application for a startup company. It is a platform where users can book services like plumbing, electrician, carpenter, etc. It has Razorpay payment gateway for online transactions.
